image_alt: Photo: Dietmar Rabich, Wikimedia Commons, CC BY-SA 4.0
author: Translated by E.V. Rieu
desc: Injustice, glory, grief, and the price of life. The oldest epic in the Western tradition follows the great-souled life of Achilles, son of Peleus. We read his story not as ancient history, but as the first western tragedy.
title: Homer's Iliad
